attributes.action: stop the federalisation of rural schools in the county of Gwynedd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a few years 29 of Gwynedd's local schools will be closed under the Federalisation strategy adopted by the Local Govergnment. These schools are by no means delapidated and under funded-quite the opposite they play a major role in community in rural wales. Some have had millions spent on them in only the last few years. Save our rural schools!!

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the devolved administration.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
